title: Bug with Heal (might be a Jinx bug though)
body: I was playing some ranked and noticed that when I picked Heal on Jinx I couldn't lock in, it happened in two games. Idk if it's a bug with Jinx or Heal but I could lock in when I changed my summoner spell but it didn't work again if I went back to Heal.

replies.body: ahhh dont worry every now and again you wont be able to lock in your champ, just click a different champion and then re pick your champion and PROBLEM SOLVED
